hierarchize[source]

hierarchize(df:DataFrame, hiers:List[typing.List[str]], agg_fn:typing.Callable=sum)

Aggregates df according to hiers using agg_fn.

Type Default Details
df DataFrame DataFrame with columns ['ds', 'y'] and columns to hierarchize
hiers typing.List[typing.List[str]] List of hierarchies. Each element of the list contains a list of columns of df to hierarchize.
agg_fn typing.Callable sum Function used to aggregate 'y'.
{% endraw %}
